thread.title: Three-time women’s champ Peoples will run after all
thread.title_full: Three-time women’s champ Peoples will run after all

author: STAFF REPORT
title: Three-time women’s champ Peoples will run after all
text:
Sign Up Text Alerts | newsletter 
It appears the 20th Steamtown Marathon will have a familiar face after all. 
After first deciding not to run, three-time women’s champion Heidi Peoples was a late entry to the field Friday. 
The 35-year-old Scranton resident won the race in 2008, 2010 and 2012, while also finishing runner-up last year.
